ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Interface RigidBodyTransformable3

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Rotatable3, Translatable3
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AffineTransformable3, ShapePreservingTransformable3
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineTransformation3, InvertibleAffineTransformation3, MeshBuilder, TransformableGeometry, TransformableLens, TransformableSceneElement

    public interface RigidBodyTransformable3
extends Translatable3, Rotatable3
    Represents a three dimensional rigid body (something that can be rotated and translated).
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from interface ca.eandb.jmist.framework.Translatable3

        translate

      • Methods inherited from interface ca.eandb.jmist.framework.Rotatable3

        rotate, rotateX, rotateY, rotateZ
